title: 2004년 Tyquisha Dorsey Sias v. State 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Tyquisha Dorsey Sias v. State. 판결일: 2004-12-15. 법원: Court of Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Tyquisha Dorsey Sias v. State
**판결일**: 2004-12-15
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX


## 판결문 요약








In The



Court of Appeals



Ninth District of Texas at Beaumont



____________________



NO. 09-04-474 CR


____________________



TYQUISHA DORSEY SIAS, Appellant



V.



THE STATE OF TEXAS, Appellee






On Appeal from the 252nd District Court


Jefferson County, Texas


Trial Cause No. 90258






MEMORANDUM OPINION (1)


	Tyquisha Dorsey Sias was convicted of manslaughter and sentenced to 20 years of
imprisonment.  Sias filed a notice of appeal on November 5, 2004.  The trial court entered
a certification of the defendant's right to appeal in which the court certified that this is a
plea-bargain case and the defendant has no right of appeal.  See Tex. R. App. P.
25.2(a)(2).  The trial court's certification has been provided to the Court of Appeals by the
district clerk.

	On November 10, 2004, we notified the parties that the appeal would be dismissed
unless an amended certification was filed within thirty days of the date of the notice and
made a part of the appellate record.  See Tex. R. App. P. 37.1.  The record has not been
supplemented with an amended certification.  Because a certification that shows the
defendant has the right of appeal has not been made part of the record, the appeal must be
dismissed.  See Tex. R. App. P. 25.2(d).

	Accordingly, we dismiss the appeal for want of jurisdiction.

	APPEAL DISMISSED.

								PER CURIAM


Opinion Delivered December 15, 2004...
